name: Dog Swimming Race
description:
Dog swimming race is the first and amazing swimming simulator game on the Store. It is the most adventurous game in which the dogs will swim in the water to win the race. This is the most interesting and joyful game of dogs on your screen.

In this awesome swimming simulator game you can enjoy many different and new thrilling features. In this best simulator game you have to select a dog for the race which will be held in pool filled with water. You have to control the selected dogs in this swimming race and leave all the opponent behind and try hard to win the race.

During the race the opponent dogs will try their best to defeat you in the race but you have to control your selected dog amazingly to win the race and move faster than all other dogs and reached at the finish line first. If you are not able to reach at the finish line first then you will lose the competition and you have to play the level again and again until you will get first position.

You have to win the race in any case to unlock new levels and many other features of this dog swimming race 2017. The race is between dogs from the one side of pool to other side. You have to controls the dog with wonderful skills and also have to keep an eye on the stamina line. Due to continuously swimming the dog may be tried and you may have to play again.

The low stamina can reduce the speed of your dog and in this case you may lose the competition. You can also can change the dog for swimming and also can choose the swimming styles in this water swimming race simulator 3D. You can also enjoy multiple levels in this water pool race and many other things. This is the best and marvelous simulation game on your mobile screen.
Game Feature
Good and real Physics
Realistic environment
Smooth and easy controls
Best 3D simulator
No internet connection required to play the game
